overview: Cheer International Trade Co.Ltd (http://www.cheerwholesale.com) is a professional Trade Company. Our Company was established in 2003 and located in PuTian City, China. We have our own factory for Producing quality name brands footwear and clothing at a very competitive level. Our Company specializing in the production of the high quality Products which are the Shoes, Apparel, Cap, Sunglass, Watch, Belt, Wallet, Jewelry and other products. It is including all kinds of the fashionable styles, size, design and so on. With high-standard quality, satisfied service, timely shipping, and reasonable price, our company has had good reputation around the world. Our products have been sold well in many regions like America, Europe, Southeast Asia and the Middle East. All the products are packaged with original box, tags and labels. We are confident that we can provide exactly the goods you need with the most competitive price and the fastest delivery. “Quality first, Credit and Serviceâ€ is our belief, striving for innovation is our goal for evermore. We are looking forward to cooperating with old and new customers. Please contact us at any time for more details.
